LanguageData.Ad_Turret_Mortar.label: advanced mortar
LanguageData.Ad_Turret_Mortar.description: A manned mortar that launches all kinds of shells with good accuracy.
LanguageData.Ad_Artillery_Mortar.label: advanced mortar
LanguageData.Ad_Artillery_Mortar.description: Mortar launcher. Lobs bombs over walls. Accurate and long-ranged.
